attributes.action: Stop the media from harassing Tyson fury the  heavyweight champion of the world
attributes.background: Tyson fury is just a normal down to earth lad Anyone who knows him will tell you his remarks are very much tongue in cheek The media seem to be on a witch hunt to discredit his brilliant performance in Germany to bring the titles back 2 the UK He won he is the champ lets give him some postive press

rejection.details: Media coverage is not the responsibility of the UK Government or Parliament.
